summary.span: 命名空間包含用來傳送電子郵件至 Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) 傳遞用途之伺服器的類別。

span.span: The namespace contains classes used to send electronic mail to a Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server for delivery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表郵件訊息的內容。The class represents the content of a mail message. 類別傳送電子郵件給您指定的郵件傳遞的 SMTP 主機。The class transmits email to the SMTP host that you designate for mail delivery. 您可以建立使用 mail 附件類別。You can create mail attachments using the class.
